summary: This module defines core mixins that endow diffusion model classes with capabilities for handling configurations, loading and saving pretrained checkpoints, managing device placement and data types, applying gradient checkpointing and memory‑efficient attention, supporting quantization, and interfacing with model hubs. It also includes utilities for retrieving parameter device and dtype information and a compatibility layer for legacy model formats.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration, distribution, and efficient execution of diffusion models by providing a unified, version‑compatible API for model management, resource optimization, and hub interaction.
